title.narrative: CHILD POVERTY

description.narrative: By 2025, the Federal and Member State governments are better able to deliver shock-responsive social protection programmes and reach the most deprived., which contributes to Reducing Child Poverty, Reducing Child Poverty (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, fewer Somali children live in poverty (income-and multi-dimensional) and more have access to adequate social services to enable them to reach their full potential.

mailing-address.narrative: UNICEF Somalia Support Centre (USSC) P.O. Box 44145 - 00100 Nairobi

sector.narrative: Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Child poverty measurement: support to routine national measurement of monetary and multidimensional child poverty

Contributing to policies reducing child poverty: Poverty reduction strategies, national development plans, engagement with ministries, parliament, international donor and financial organizations, civil society organizations)
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Technical assistance - Child poverty, Public Finance and Local Governance

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2025, the Federal and Member State governments are better able to deliver shock-responsive social protection programmes andreach the most deprived.

description.narrative: With political turmoil lingering throughout all 2021, results on upstream policy engagement, has been severely constrained. UNICEF’s focus has been on supporting the Social Development Subcabinet team at the Office of the Prime Minister to ensure its operation within government as well as its role as Co-Chair of the Social Development Pillar of the Aid Architecture. The first year of the new CDP has been also for engaging with the newly created Somalia National Bureau of Statistics. | Status:Partially met | As-of Date:05/01/2022

title.narrative: Percentage of child-centred SDG indicators that are included in the NDP-10 M&E plan, Percent
Percentage of child-centred SDG indicators that are monitored and reported in NDP implementation reports., Text

baseline.value: Level 0 Child related SDGs indicators are not adopted for monitoring in NDP implementation reports.

target.value: 2025:Level 3 – Child related SDGs indicators are integrated, data is collected but only partially reported in NDP implementation reports.

actual.value: 2021:Level 0 – Child related SDGs indicators are not adopted for monitoring in NDP implementation reports.

title.narrative: Percentage of child-centred SDG indicators that are monitored and reported in NDP implementation reports., Text

baseline.value: Level 0 Child related SDGs indicators are not adopted for monitoring in NDP implementation reports.

target.value: 2025:Level 3 – Child related SDGs indicators are integrated, data is collected but only partially reported in NDP implementation reports.

actual.value: 2021:Level 0 – Child related SDGs indicators are not adopted for monitoring in NDP implementation reports.

title.narrative: Level of use by National government measurement of child poverty using multidimensional measures., Text

baseline.value: Level 1 - There is no child poverty measurement available in the country.

target.value: 2025:Level 3 – There is a multidimensional child poverty measurement supported by the government but is not routinely measured.

actual.value: 2021:Level 1 - There is no child poverty measurement available in the country.
